trends: There have been 3 other sightings in St Marys
There were no other sightings in St Marys on or around December 4th 2012
Summary: Notices saucer shaped objst hovering above tree line adjacent to the road we were traveling on.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was driving my three girls home from shoppng in town (Saint Marys, Ga.) on Tuesday, December 4th. They were traveling north on Charley Smith Road moving towards the Crooked River State Park. At approximately 6:45 p.m. as my 15 year old daughter was looking west out of her window she immediately noticed a grey colored, saucer shaper UFO with blinking lights just above the tree line adjacent to the road. She mentioned it to my wife who proceded to turn around. As she turned around my daughter lost sight of it. When they returned to the site it was gone. At the time of the sighting the objsct was approximately 50 yars from the vehicle.
